name: @chatgpt-web/docs
description: Documentation package for ChatGPT Web monorepo

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && echo 'Documentation build complete' > dist/.gitkeep
scripts.dev: echo 'Documentation package - no dev server needed'

scripts.quality:fix: pnpm run lint:fix && pnpm run format
scripts.clean: echo 'Nothing to clean in docs package'
